changeSet.neo4j:cypher: CALL apoc.trigger.add('add-nanoid-property', ' UNWIND $createdNodes AS node WITH node WHERE ANY(label IN labels(node) WHERE label IN ["node", "relationship", "property", "value_set", "concept", "predicate", "term", "origin", "model", "tag"]) AND NOT exists(node.nanoid) SET node.nanoid = apoc.text.random(6, "abcdefghijkmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHJKMNPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789") ', { phase: "afterAsync" })
